body: @paulcbetts I pushed a fix for this in #6637 but I had trouble reproducing it locally with full screen windows. Are you able to reproduce it consistently?
@kevinsawicki Not consistently but we've gotten enough reports of it that it's A Thing. It indeed does seem to be related to full-screen windows

Reopening; after releasing the Mac public beta this is one of our top crash reports. :pensive:

<details>

